sentences.en: The differential diagnoses include usually smallpox, chickenpox, measles, bacterial skin infections, scabies, medicamentous allergies and syphilis.
sentences.cn: 鉴别诊断通常包括天花、水痘、麻疹、细菌性皮肤感染、疥疮、药物过敏和梅毒。

sentences.en: Syphilis was the most feared of venereal diseases.
sentences.cn: 梅毒是最让人谈虎色变的一种性传播疾病。

sentences.en: Does Internet Use Lead to Addiction, Loneliness, Depression…and Syphilis?
sentences.cn: 上网导致网瘾、孤独、抑郁和……梅毒？
